column1: To enter The Gambia, you will need to show a negative Covid-19 test taken no more than 72 hours before you travel You must present a physical copy of the test results to Ministry of Health officials upon arrival. Breach of this regulation can result in a fine of up to 5000 Dalasi If you are in receipt of a negative Covid-19 test, you will be required to self-isolate at home/one location for 14 days. If you are not in receipt of a negative Covid-19 test you will be moved to a government designated quarantine facility at your own cost for 14 days
And a Gambian passport or residents permit presumably? Still no tourists allowed right?
